pullrequest.title: Support new ErrorStr API in tinyxml2 6.0.0 (#28)

content.raw:
I apologize for being nitpicky, but if I'm not mistaken, the recommended practice when using `taget_compile_definitions(~)` is to leave out the `-D`. I think cmake is smart enough to ignore the `-D` when it's there, but I believe it's considered better practice to leave it out.

It's a minor detail, though, so I'm happy with this PR either way.
content.html:
I apologize for being nitpicky, but if I'm not mistaken, the recommended practice when using taget_compile_definitions(~) is to leave out the -D. I think cmake is smart enough to ignore the -D when it's there, but I believe it's considered better practice to leave it out.

It's a minor detail, though, so I'm happy with this PR either way.
